item.title: Building a high-performance database buffer pool in Zig using io_uring's new fixed-buffer mode
item.description: In this post, we will explore how to build a high-performance database buffer pool in Zig using io_uring's new fixed-buffer mode.
item.author: ray.gavin97@gmail.com (Gavin Ray)

item.title: Panama: Not-so-Foreign Memory. Using MemorySegment as a high-performance ByteBuffer replacement.
item.description: An overview of how the Panama Foreign Memory API can be useful outside of foreign/native applications
item.author: ray.gavin97@gmail.com (Gavin Ray)

item.title: Building a Query Expression Language in Kotlin, plus dynamic SQL Generation using jOOQ
item.description: A tutorial on building a Query Expression Language/AST in Kotlin and implementing SQL generation
item.author: ray.gavin97@gmail.com (Gavin Ray)
